p.2: Triumph Tech is an Advanced Tier AWS partner. Triumph Tech is one of the fastest going AWS partners in the country and we are hiring DevOps Engineers at all levels. Triumph Tech has operations in Philadelphia, PA, Long Island, NY, South New Jersey, Naples, Florida, Washington, DC, and Seattle, Washington. Join our growing team. Great Benefits, company profit share plan, and AWS training. This role is 100% remote.
p.4: We are looking for a highly capable machine learning engineer to optimize our machine learning systems. You will be evaluating existing machine learning (ML) processes, performing statistical analysis to resolve data set problems, and enhancing the accuracy of our AI software's predictive automation capabilities.

li: Consulting with managers to determine and refine machine learning objectives.
li.1: Designing machine learning systems and self-running artificial intelligence (AI) software to automate predictive models.
li.2: Transforming data science prototypes and applying appropriate ML algorithms and tools.
li.3: Ensuring that algorithms generate accurate user recommendations.
li.4: Turning unstructured data into useful information by auto-tagging images and text-to-speech conversions.
li.5: Solving complex problems with multi-layered data sets, as well as optimizing existing machine learning libraries and frameworks.
li.6: Developing ML algorithms to analyze huge volumes of historical data to make predictions.
li.7: Running tests, performing statistical analysis, and interpreting test results.
li.9: Keeping abreast of developments in machine learning.

li: Bachelor's degree in computer science, data science, mathematics, or a related field.
li.1: At least 5 years experience as a machine learning engineer.
li.2: Advanced proficiency with Python, Java, and R code writing.
li.3: Experience with AWS SageMaker, Rekognition, Comprehend, and Textract
li.4: Extensive knowledge of ML frameworks, libraries, data structures, data modeling, and software architecture.
li.5: Experience with Computer Vision (CV) and Natural Language Processing (NLP)
li.6: In-depth knowledge of mathematics, statistics, and algorithms.
li.9: Excellent time management and organizational abilities.
